title: Cheesy Black Bean Quesadillas
instructions: Drain and rinse the black beans, then mash them in a mixing bowl.
Grate the cheese and add it to the beans.
Trim and chop the spring onions and coriander, then add to the bowl.
Add cumin, paprika, salt, and pepper. Mix everything together.
Spread half the mixture on one half of a tortilla, fold it over. Repeat with the second wrap.
Cook each quesadilla in a frying pan over low-medium heat for 2–4 minutes per side until golden brown.
notes: You can swap black beans for chickpeas, kidney beans, or black-eyed beans.
Tortilla wraps can be baked into chips at 180°C with oil and spices for 10 minutes.
